you	have	coeliac	disease,	
diabetes,	are	living	with	
overweight or obesity or take 
anti-epileptic	medicines,	ask	
your GP or midwife for more 
advice. You will need to take a 
bigger dose of folic acid that 
requires a prescription. See 
the	PHA	leaflet	Folic	Acid	-	
one of life’s essentials at 
www.publichealth.hscni.net
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Preparing food
• Wash fruit, vegetables and salads to 
remove all traces of soil, which may contain
